title: He thu ropui ril hle
lyrics:
He thu ropui ril hle,
Lalpa Isua sawi hi,
Ringtu tan chuan a lo fiah hle,
"I piangthar tur a ni."

"I piangthar tur a ni,"
That deuh mai a tawk lo;
Sual peng sah thlak chang ni lo hi,
Pianthar bul kan ngai theuh.

"I piangthar tur a ni,"
Lalpaah nun nei hian,
Nun bul dang a awm dawn loh hi,
Chatuan, chatuanah pawh.

"I piangthar tur a ni,"
thlarauva piang lote,
Pathian ram chang lo an ni si,
Vanduai tawp an ni e.

"I piangthar tur a ni,"
Hmanah i ti, Lalpa;
Pianthar leh harhna kan ngaih hi,
Hei hi min pe theuh la.
